name: docpad-plugin-ruby
description: Adds support for the Ruby language to DocPad.
readme:
# Ruby Plugin for DocPad Adds support to [DocPad](https://docpad.org) for writing your templates using [Ruby](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ERuby) Convention: `.anything.rb|ruby|erb` ## Install ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-ruby ``` ## History You can discover the history inside the `History.md` file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
Copyright © 2012 [Bevry Pty Ltd](http://bevry.me)
Copyright © 2011 [Benjamin Lupton](http://balupton.com)
